alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Laurens; Telfair; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Laurens, east central Dodge, north central Telfair and west central Wheeler Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Chauncey, or 9 miles west of McRae, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Helena, Milan, Chauncey, Jay Bird Springs, Achord and Little Ocmulgee State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
